pageContent: Background: The indication and effectiveness of definitive local treatment for prostate cancer in patients with a limited life expectancy remains to be established. This study is a retrospective analysis of the long-term clinical outcome of elderly patients with localized prostate cancer treated by radiotherapy or a radical prostatectomy.

metaData.source:
[Comparative oncologic and functional outcomes of prostate cancer surgery with other curative treatments]
